comment:
Any woman who has actually been im an abusive relationship should find amber heard's actions and her story totally disgusting. Just look at the evidence online. Eatch their deposition with the police and it's very clear she is lying and playing the victim. Im dead ass...i dont even watch depps movies outside of the classic edward sissorhands and the very first pirates movie. But i am furious at the details of the case and its VERY VERY clear who is lying. 

Depp has hotel security and staff and neutral business associates as a witnesses to heards anger. His own personal body guards. His ex wife and two long term girlfriends all stand by johnny. They have ZERO reason to lie and could easily boost their own careers by going along with heard's lies. The police officers who first responded to the call of domestic abuse said heard had zero bruises or marks on her. Cops reported that The house was *not* trashed and destroyed like she stated in her case....few days later she suddenly "bruises" on her face 

Heard has a history of violence and anger against ex lovers and family she had a restraining order placed against her from her ex girlfriend who said heard hit her in anger!

Johnny even has released txt messages from heards parents telling him they still see him as their son-in-law and begging him not to let amber know they were txting him because they said they know how angery she can get...what mother and father reach out in love to the man who is beating their own daughter?!? Her own parents knew it was bullshit. They know what amber heard is capable of and reached out to johnny in good faith...

SHE CUT OFF HIS FUCKING FINGER AND SHIT IN HIS BED AND ADMITTED SHE HIT HIM ON A RECORDED CALL!

Amber heard is a disgusting peice of trash and i hope people can look past her good looks and see that she is a fucking rotten human being in her soul. I hope he reputation in Hollywood burns to ashes and companies looking to do business with her are crushed by waves of backlash online. 

Justice for johnny!

He did not hurt his family, fans, and friends. Nuh-uh. Amber is a pathetic actress and liar. Amber's assistant and even her lawyer exposed her lying! I am mad at the judges that believed Amber's story. Did they forget that women can be also horrible abusers? Amber controlled every step that Johnny took just like how Meghan Markle is now controlling every step of her husband, Prince Harry. 
I bet that Amber is in danger since the fans are attacking her if she is out of her hiding place. She constantly changed her phone number since the fans somehow managed to hack or figure the numbers out. That pathetic woman even attacked and stalked Johnny's supporters like what the heck?! Johnny's friends clearly warned the gentle and kind man about Amber but yet, love blinded him. 
We can help Johnny Depp to win the case if we send proof, love, and support. The court better hire body language experts there!
author: Olivia_ Playz2003
